thread.title_full: Candice Swanepoel shares shot of four-month-old baby Anacã | Daily Mail Online

author: Kelvera At Dailymail.Com
title: Candice Swanepoel shares shot of four-month-old baby Anacã | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share The Victoria's Secret Angel's skin glowed as she smiled at the camera next to her bundle of joy. The pair rest upon cheery blue bedding which compliments their beautiful eye colors and matching features. Who's daddy? Anacã's father is Brazilian model Hermann Nicoli, who Candice has been dating for nearly twelve years Little Anacã wore a pair of shorts that looked like they were perfectly paired with the bed's pillows and sheets while mom covered up with a grey tank that revealed a hint of cleavage. The South African born talent wore several glimmering necklaces while her little guy sported his own necklace made out of amber beads for teething on. Candice captioned the photo with two emojis to represent her small wonder: a little prince and a flexing arm. Pride and joy! The South African beauty is happy to share pictures of her beautiful baby boy. Here is a snapshot from late November The new mom has been happy to share pictures of her pride and joy since his October 5 birth. The genetically gifted baby's father is Brazilian model Hermann Nicoli, who has been dating IMG repped model since October 2005. The couple announced their engagement in August 2015, with news of their first baby arriving just seven months later. They have yet to announce a wedding date. Share or comment on this article 5
